post.author: 김민
post.content:
Hi,
I think you are gonna to the US in near soon. You can change the Ontario's driver license to some states in US. But you should check the rules of California, because all of states have their own rules for that. All of the driver license related jobs are serviced by DMV, department of motor vehicles.
You can go to "http://www.dmv.ca.gov/" and check it.
Good luck.
post.title: Maybe, you shoud check through following site !!
